title: NOAA welcomes the 2020 undergraduate scholars
content:
NOAA Office of Education has selected 123 Ernest F. Hollings undergraduate scholars and 15 Jos√© E. Serrano Educational Partnership Program with Minority Serving Institutions (EPP/MSI) undergraduate scholars for the classes of 2020. Scholars receive a two-year academic scholarship for their junior and senior years, paid summer internship opportunities, and funding to participate in two national scientific conferences.
